name: Coherence
description:
Coherence was created for Global Game Jam in 2017. The theme was "wave".  In the Coherence, we want to use the frequency as the key element of our game. Player can find the different scenes by change the frequency of radio, then try to solve the puzzle and pass the game.

Our team named Tsunami and our team members are Haining Kong, Yukun Huang, Jianhan Gao.
